verbs.description: [ARG0: phoenix police] [V: increase] [ARG1: patrols around houses of worship] [ARGM-TMP: after pittsburgh mass shooting valley] police agencies conducted more patrols and secured jewish buildings and other religious facilities saturday after the pittsburgh mass shooting robert bowers tempe pittsburgh carlos galindo elvira arizona anti defamation league arizona adl pittsburgh public safety department regional director associated press carlos galindo - elvira pittsburgh police phoenix phoenix arizona temple of emanuel detective lily duran sgt tommy thompson phoenix police department arizona anti - defamation league sgt tommy thompson
